thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Dolphin Says Agreement For Disposal Of 100% Interest In Triopetra Project

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Dolphin Says Agreement For Disposal Of 100% Interest In Triopetra Project
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Dolphin Capital Investors Ltd:
* DOLPHIN CAPITAL INV - DISPOSAL * ‍DISPOSAL​ * SAYS ENTERED INTO AN AGREEMENT FOR DISPOSAL OF ITS 100% INTEREST IN TRIOPETRA PROJECT
* ‍ACQUIRER WILL PURCHASE ALL OF DCI‘S STAKE IN TRIOPETRA FOR A TOTAL CASH CONSIDERATION OF EUR 4.1M​
* SAYS ACQUIRER WILL PURCHASE ALL OF DCI‘S STAKE IN TRIOPETRA FOR A TOTAL CASH CONSIDERATION OF EUR 4.1M
* SAYS EUR 4M WAS RECEIVED ON TUESDAY * SAYS REMAINING EUR 100,000 WILL BE WITHHELD UNTIL FIRST ANNIVERSARY FROM TRANSACTION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
